description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Chiang Rai, Thailand. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Elegant Five-Star Chiang Rai Riverside Escape with Mini Waterpark & Three Restaurants
hotels.description: Discover the wonderous beauty of northern Thailand with a five-star stay at The Riverie by Katathani, on the banks of the Kok River. This elegant escape has something for everyone, from outdoor pools and a mini waterpark to the calming tranquillity of Tivaa Ratrii Spa. Enjoy a cocktail at Jujube Pool Bar before choosing which of the three restaurants to dine at: try authentic Thai plates at Blossom Restaurant where the food is surpassed only by the views.

hotels.title: Luxurious Five-Star Anantara Thailand Retreat within Jungle Elephant Sanctuary
hotels.description: Experience Thailand like never before with a stay nestled in the lush jungle of the luxurious Anantara Golden Triangle Elephant Camp & Resort. Perched at the pinnacle of a mountain ridge, the resort is surrounded by tranquil vistas over the rolling hills of Myanmar and Laos. Its chief draw is the onsite elephant sanctuary, offering the chance for unique encounters with these incredible creatures. Add opulent dining and adventure experiences, and you have a Chiang Rai escape you'll remember forever.
